name: SEVENTEEN
description: SEVENTEEN is a 13-member K-Pop group known for their self-producing abilities, synchronized performances, and three specialized units.

funFacts: Leader of both SEVENTEEN and Hip-hop Unit
Known for taking care of all 12 members
Has a soft heart despite tough image
Took hiatus in 2020 for mental health
His leadership is warm and inclusive
members.bio: S.Coups is SEVENTEEN's reliable leader who cares for all 12 members like a father. Despite his powerful rap, he's known for his soft heart. His leadership has kept SEVENTEEN united for years.

funFacts: Actually a master prankster and trickster
Famous for being lazy but talented
His long hair era was iconic
Can get away with anything with his face
members.bio: Jeonghan is SEVENTEEN's angel who's actually a mischievous trickster. His angelic visuals hide a playful personality. Known as a 'lazy genius,' he's talented despite minimal effort.
Joshua is SEVENTEEN's American gentleman from LA. His kind personality and guitar skills are beloved. He brings international appeal and a calming presence to the group.

funFacts: Was a child actor in China
members.bio: Jun is SEVENTEEN's Chinese member and elegant dancer. He was a child actor before becoming an idol. His cat-like visuals and quiet charm make him unique in the group.

funFacts: Obsessed with tigers - 'Horanghae' is his thing
His eyes look like 10:10 on a clock
members.bio: Hoshi is SEVENTEEN's tiger and choreography genius. He leads the Performance Unit and creates their iconic choreography. His tiger obsession and 10:10 eyes are legendary.

funFacts: Known for his deep voice and cold image
Actually a huge bookworm and gamer
His rapping style is unique and smooth
members.bio: Wonwoo is SEVENTEEN's deep-voiced rapper who loves books and games. Despite his cold image, he's gentle. His friendship with Mingyu ('Meanie') is one of K-Pop's most beloved.

funFacts: Shortest member but huge musical genius
His dedication to music is legendary
members.bio: Woozi is SEVENTEEN's genius producer who creates their music. Despite being the shortest, his talent is immense. His honest personality and musical dedication have made him legendary.
DK is SEVENTEEN's sunshine with one of the most powerful voices. His bright personality and incredible vocals make him beloved. His musical theater debut proved his versatility.

funFacts: One of the tallest K-Pop idols at 187cm
Very clumsy despite his cool image
members.bio: Mingyu is SEVENTEEN's tall visual and chef. At 187cm with model proportions, he's stunning. His cooking skills and 'Meanie' friendship with Wonwoo are beloved by fans.

funFacts: Known for his unique b-boy style dancing
His visual style is very distinct
members.bio: The8 is SEVENTEEN's artistic Chinese member with unique b-boy skills. His photography and fashion sense set him apart. His fairy-like visuals and artistic soul are beloved.

funFacts: Known as the best variety star in SEVENTEEN
members.bio: Seungkwan is SEVENTEEN's variety king from Jeju. His powerful vocals and entertainment skills are unmatched. His honest, emotional personality and humor make him beloved.

funFacts: His rap style is very Western-influenced
Was on Korean child star show pre-debut
members.bio: Vernon is SEVENTEEN's half-American rapper from New York. His Western-influenced rap and meme-worthy personality are unique. His mixed heritage gives him international appeal.

funFacts: Has grown from cute maknae to charismatic performer
His solo performances showcase his talent
members.bio: Dino is SEVENTEEN's maknae and dance prodigy. His name means dinosaur, reflecting his powerful presence. He's grown from cute maknae to one of K-Pop's best dancers.

seo.title: SEVENTEEN Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with CARAT
seo.description: Create your SEVENTEEN name with all 13 members - S.Coups, Jeonghan, Joshua, Jun, Hoshi & more! Instant chemistry scores. Perfect for CARAT fanfiction.
